verses.verse: I love <S%H157><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> because he listens <S%H8085><s%> to my voice, <S%H6963><s%> and my cries for mercy. <S%H8469><s%>
Because he has turned <S%H5186><s%> his ear <S%H241><s%> to me, <S%H7121><s%> therefore I will call on him as long as I live. <S%H3117><s%>

The cords <S%H2256><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> surrounded <S%H661><s%> me, <S%H4712><s%> the pains of Sheol <S%H7585><s%> got a hold <S%H4672><s%> of me. <S%H4672><s%> I found trouble <S%H6869><s%> and sorrow. <S%H3015><s%>
Then I called <S%H7121><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> I beg <S%H577><s%> you, <S%H4422><s%> deliver my soul. <S%H5315><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is Gracious <S%H2587><s%> and righteous. <S%H6662><s%> Yes, <S%H430><s%> our God is merciful. <S%H7355><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> preserves <S%H8104><s%> the simple. <S%H6612><s%> I was brought low, <S%H1809><s%> and he saved me. <S%H3467><s%>
Return <S%H7725><s%> to your rest, <S%H4494><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has dealt bountifully with you. <S%H1580><s%>
For you have delivered <S%H2502><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from death, <S%H4194><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> from tears, <S%H1832><s%> and my feet <S%H7272><s%> from falling. <S%H1762><s%>
I will walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>
I believed, <S%H539><s%> therefore I said, <S%H1696><s%> "I was greatly <S%H3966><s%> afflicted. <S%H6031><s%>"
I said <S%H559><s%> in my haste, <S%H2648><s%> "All men <S%H120><s%> are liars. <S%H3576><s%>"
What will I give <S%H7725><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for all his benefits toward me? <S%H8408><s%>
I will take <S%H5375><s%> the cup <S%H3563><s%> of salvation, <S%H3444><s%> and call <S%H7121><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
I will pay <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> yes, <S%H5971><s%> in the presence of all his people.
Precious <S%H3368><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is the death <S%H4194><s%> of his saints. <S%H2623><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> truly <S%H577><s%> I am your servant. <S%H5650><s%> I am your servant, <S%H5650><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of your handmaid. <S%H519><s%> You have freed <S%H6605><s%> me from my chains. <S%H4147><s%>
I will offer <S%H2076><s%> to you the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> and will call <S%H7121><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
I will pay <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> yes, <S%H5971><s%> in the presence of all his people,
in the courts <S%H2691><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you, <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem. Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%>
